69319dbec4c13fc4823f299e Description: Made famous by the SAS during the Iranian Embassy Siege.
6931ac76994f765b133f29a2 Description: Made famous by the SAS during the Iranian Embassy Siege. It is not a particularly good flashlight
693b4869442747eceb61d959 Description: A full-face replica helmet modeled after sci-fi shock troopers. Fence commissioned a group of Scavs to mass-produce these using consumer-grade 3D printers found in the mall. While it offers excellent concealment for your identity, the layers of PLA plastic provide roughly the same ballistic protection as a milk jug. Cosplay only.
693b4bedda33c6085861d95b Description: Another one of Fence's 'special projects.' This Scout variant was printed with 20% infill to save on filament. It looks tactical, but it will shatter on impact. Ideal for frightening locals or blocking the wind, but terrible for stopping anything larger than a BB.
693b4c2ce49469667461d95d Description: A vintage DH-132 Combat Vehicle Crewman helmet from the Vietnam era. Designed for tank crews to communicate over the roar of a diesel engine, it features a built-in headset and a high-cut shell for bump protection inside cramped turrets. It smells faintly of napalm and offers decent shrapnel resistance.
